description: This is a new weekly podcast from writer, presenter and founder of BOB by DOP, Dawn O'Porter. Each week Dawn will talk to someone  interesting about why they wear what they wear. What does the way you dress say about you?
title: Get It On

episodes.title: Ep 31 with Lliana Bird
episodes.description:
Dawn chats to Lliana Bird about dressing crazy, the joy of pajamas and Choosing LOVE.  

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

episodes.title: Ep 30 A VINTAGE SPECIAL with Kate Tegmeyer
episodes.description:
Dawn chats to a vintage skeptic, Kate Tegmeyer, about day to day dressing, then hit a local vintage shop to find some treasures.  

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

episodes.title: Ep 29 with Jennifer Westfeltd
episodes.description:
